bug.author: kunc01
bug.description: I am tring to write a rnn training example since there is only a rnn inference example. But I am stuck at creating and I found a misspelling in <denchmark-link:url>https://github.com/intel/mkl-dnn/blob/master/src/cpu/cpu_rnn_pd.hpp#L230</denchmark-link> . I guess should be ?Thank you!

comments.comment: Hi @sjtuck, Yeah, you are right, thanks! The problem should be already fixed by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/oneapi-src/oneDNN/commit/304835cb48de33acbd7c938002f023896dd4da15>304835c</denchmark-link> . Please try the latest master.
